en: I was at the entrance of my apartment, and a girl in sportswear gave me a brochure
Girl in sportswear
Hi handsome! We have opened a gym just next to the mall.
It's such a, such a, such a, good facility!
Now it's on [font_size=9]pre-order[/font_size], just 100 for a month
Pay now
Have a look first
Me
Then I'll need to have a look first
No problem, it's just at the mall's Section B, easy to get there!
I walked to Section B of the mall, and sure enough, I saw a storefront under renovation, surrounded by barriers. A simple piece of paper was taped on it: "Fitness Club - Coming Soon."
The 100 dollar they asked me to pay is probably just 1/N of the renovation team's unpaid balance.
Next Monday, We'll meet again!
On Monday, I hurried to the mall, full of excitement.
The scene before my eyes left me petrified - a storefront under renovation, fenced off, with nothing but a simple piece of paper taped to it: "Fitness Club - Coming Soon."
So sorry, dear~ The fire safety inspection hasn't been approved yet. Let's wait patiently for one more week, okay?~ [Cute Emoji]
Wait for a week
Ask for refund
It's been 2 weeks, the gym is still closed.
It's been a month, the gym is still closed.
It's been 2 months, the gym is still closed.
It's been another week, the gym is still closed.
The gym room will likely not open in the future...
Hey girl (WeChat)
Hi dear~ My apology...
Hi dear~ My apology~ Like this, this this...and that, that, that... Be patient, let's wait for a week~[Cute Emoji]
I insist to ask for the refund, the girl just told me the "contact of the officer".
Officer (Phone)
Refund? Alright, regarding our rules, 30% as the processing fee is non-refundable.
Mr. Liang, could you pay...the wage of last week?
...Umm...Umm.. Oh...Umm, okay...
Click to Start
